abstract: The Simon Property Group is preparing to raise its $10 billion offer for General Growth Properties in a bid to overcome a rival plan proposed by the bankrupt mall operator in concert with Brookfield Asset Management, people briefed on the matter told DealBook on Tuesday.

lead_paragraph: 6:47 p.m. | Updated The Simon Property Group is preparing to raise its $10 billion offer for General Growth Properties in a bid to overcome a rival plan proposed by the bankrupt mall operator in concert with Brookfield Asset Management, people briefed on the matter told DealBook on Tuesday.

headline.main: Simon Prepares New Offer for General Growth

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
